segments.text: We have received your resume in answer to our ads . I would like to talk with you regarding your qualification for this position , OK ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is my honor to have this chance for this interview . Well , my major is commercial English . You know , and I am not only familiar with useful English expressions in business , but also learn some theories on this field . Besides , during my college learning period , I also attended some commercial activities to strive for the opportunity of practicing what I learned .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I was a diligent student when I stayed in my college . I dislike meeting the deadline , when I am working on a project . I am always willing to complete it well ahead of the schedule .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What is the greatest disappointment in your life ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I lost my grandpa when I was only ten . I often recall the period when he fed me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well done ! Another question ! When will you start work , if you are hired ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I will start my work at the beginning of next month .
segments.speaker: S2
